class_notes:
Students must submit the Pre-Selection form by 9AM on May 12 to be considered for this seminar.
https://emorylaw.wufoo.com/forms/lsr-fall-2021-preselection-seminars-and-csw/
Prerequisites: None. However, a background in international law will be helpful.  
Final Exam: 30-page seminar paper. Must meet all requirements of the upper-level writing paper.
